---
category: news
title: "Cartesian Robot Improves Stud Welding Process"
excerpt: "IWT worked with Isel USA Inc. in Hicksville, NY, to develop a Cartesian robot for the system. The robot provides the I/O, automated operation, accuracy and speed required for the stud welding application. Every stud is perfectly positioned by the robot before welding. The only labor required is loading the machine and turning it on."
